CustomField.inlineHelpText: Was medication education provided for new medications or changes to medications? (including medication name, dose, route, reason for use, and potential side effects).
CustomField.label: Medication Education

value.fullName: Yes. Education provided. Patient/caregiver verbalized understanding.
value.label: Yes. Education provided. Patient/caregiver verbalized understanding.

value.fullName: No. No new medications or medication changes during this encounter. Patient/Caregiver verbalized understanding.
value.label: No. No new medications or medication changes during this encounter. Patient/Caregiver verbalized understanding.
